All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddImageCommand
The AddImageCommand class is responsible for handling the addition of images to the current session in the XML file.
App
Main application class for the Raster graphics application.
Application
The Application class serves as the entry point for running the image processing application.
CloseCommand
The CloseCommand class implements the CommandHandler interface to handle the closing of a file.
CollageCommand
The CollageCommand class represents a command for creating a collage from two images.
CollageCreator
Creates a collage by combining two images either horizontally or vertically.
Command
The Command class represents a command to be executed by the application.
CommandHandler
The CommandHandler interface defines the contract for classes that handle commands in the application.
CommandProcessor
Processes commands for the Raster graphics application.
CommandsException
The CommandsException class represents an exception specific to command handling.
CommandsTypes
The CommandsTypes enum defines different types of commands supported by the application.
DisplaySessionInfoCommand
The DisplaySessionInfoCommand class represents a command to display information about sessions.
ExitCommand
The ExitCommand class implements the CommandHandler interface to handle the exit command.
FileExceptionHandler
The FileExceptionHandler class represents an exception specific to file handling.
FileUtils
Utility class for file operations such as writing, checking existence, and saving collages.
GraphicOperations
The GraphicOperations class implements the CommandHandler interface to handle graphic operations command.
GrayScaleCommand
The GrayScaleCommand class represents a command for applying grayscale effect to images.
HelpCommand
The HelpCommand class implements the CommandHandler interface to display available commands and their descriptions.
Image
The Image class represents an image with content and a name.
ImageHandler
Handles reading and writing image data to and from files.
ImageProcessor
Handles image processing tasks such as checking if an image is a color image and applying grayscale effects to images.
ImageRotator
Utility class for rotating images in PBM, PGM, and PPM formats.
ImageUtils
Utility class for image processing operations.
LoadCommand
The LoadCommand class implements the CommandHandler interface to handle the load command.
MonoChromeCommand
The MonoChromeCommand class represents a command for converting color images to monochrome.
NegativeCommand
The NegativeCommand class represents a command for applying a negative effect to the loaded image.
OpenCommand
The OpenCommand class represents a command to open a file.
RotateImage
The RotateImage class represents a command for rotating the loaded image.
SaveAsCommand
The SaveAsCommand class implements the CommandHandler interface to handle the saveas command.
SaveCommand
The SaveCommand class implements the CommandHandler interface to handle the save command.
Session
The Session class represents a session in the application.
SwitchCommand
The SwitchCommand class implements the CommandHandler interface to handle the switch command.
UndoCommand
The UndoCommand class implements the CommandHandler interface to handle the undo command.
XMLFileHandler
The XMLFileHandler class is responsible for handling XML file operations such as opening, reading, and saving sessions.
